Graph with lowest AIC model superimposed
------------------
 

```{r, fig.height=8, fig.width=13, echo = FALSE}

InstarGridGraph(spidersMul, "logLeg", "Leg Length - log transformed", "n", "LegLengthvsNestSize_by_Instar_ZGSA", legLmFull)

```

Statistics of lowest AIC model
------------------


```{r xtable, results="asis", echo = FALSE}
#https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/xtable/xtable.pdf
myFormula1 <- as.character(legLmFull@call[2])
myFormulaRed <- as.character(legLmRed@call[2])

anv1 <- anova(legLmFull)

tab1 <- xtable(anv1, caption = paste("Table 1: anova on single lmer:", myFormula1))
print(paste("Anova of full model:", myFormula1))
print(tab1, type = "html",  caption.placement = "top", caption.colour = "black")

anv2 <- anova(legLmFull, legLmRed)

tab2 <- xtable(anova(legLmFull, legLmRed), caption = paste("Table 2: anova full vs reduced model. Formulas:", myFormula1, " Reduced:", myFormulaRed))

print(tab2, type = "html", caption.placement = "top", caption.text.colour = "black")
	
```
